item.title: The Real Meaning Of Sustenance And Profit
item.description: Profit is the value realized from human labor. Man, by nature, needs something to feed him and to provide for him in all the conditions and stages of his life from the time of his (early) growth to his maturity and on to his old age. Everyone tries to get things. Thus, whatever is obtained by one is denied to the other, unless he gives something in exchange for it.
